author: Victoria Friedman, Victoria Friedman
title: Sue Communist China for Coronavirus Pandemic, Says British Think Tank
description: A British think tank has said that Western nations where tens of thousands have died and whose economies have been damaged by Chinese coronavirus should sue the Communist country for compensation.
content:
A British think tank has said that Western nations where tens of thousands have died and whose economies have been damaged by Chinese coronavirus should sue the Communist country for compensation.
The neoconservative Henry Jackson Society (HJS) released a re… [+4583 chars]
